# sakura_simple_notification_destination (Data Source)

Get information about an existing SimpleNotification Destination.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the SimpleNotification Destination.
- `name` (String) The name of the SimpleNotification Destination.
- `tags` (Set of String) The tags of the SimpleNotification Destination.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) The description of the SimpleNotification Destination.
- `icon_id` (String) The icon id attached to the SimpleNotification Destination
- `type` (String) The type of the SimpleNotification Destination.
- `value` (String) The value of the SimpleNotification Destination.
